_description: James Ryman, a macaronic hymn to God the Father, based on the Te Deum — eight quatrains with refrain, ‘Te deum verumque laudamus’ and burden: ‘Te patrem nostrum inuocamus / Te deum verumque laudamus’

CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 240-1.
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 200; 1977, 176.
